Ward Force Assault.name: Ward Force Assault
Ward Force Assault.fullText:
Ward Guardian Attack 11Ward Force Assault

You swing at your foe and craft your warding into a blunt force that flattens your enemy when you hit.

Encounter        Arcane, Force, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence vs. AC

Hit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. In addition, either you deal extra force damage equal to your bonus from Swordmage Warding + your Constitution modifier, or you knock the target prone.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 69.
Ward Force Assault.flavor: You swing at your foe and craft your warding into a blunt force that flattens your enemy when you hit.
Ward Force Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. In addition, either you deal extra force damage equal to your bonus from Swordmage Warding + your Constitution modifier, or you knock the target prone.

Sheltering Ward.name: Sheltering Ward
Sheltering Ward.fullText:
Ward Guardian Utility 12Sheltering Ward

With intense concentration and magical power, you expand your warding to include those around you.

Daily        Arcane
Standard Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, any allies adjacent to you gain the benefit of your Swordmage Warding.

Sustain Minor: The effect persists.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 69.
Sheltering Ward.flavor: With intense concentration and magical power, you expand your warding to include those around you.
Sheltering Ward.effect: Until the end of your next turn, any allies adjacent to you gain the benefit of your Swordmage Warding.

Unseen Entanglement.name: Unseen Entanglement
Unseen Entanglement.fullText:
Ward Guardian Attack 20Unseen Entanglement

As you swing, you shape the protective power of your warding into an entangling thread that thwarts your foe’s defenses.

Daily        Arcane, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Intelligence vs. AC

Hit: 5[W] + Intelligence modifier + Constitution modifier damage. In addition, the target takes a -3 penalty to any defense to which your Swordmage Warding is currently granting a bonus (save ends).

Miss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a -1 penalty to any defense to which your Swordmage Warding is currently granting a bonus.


Published in Arcane Power, page(s) 69.
Unseen Entanglement.flavor: As you swing, you shape the protective power of your warding into an entangling thread that thwarts your foe’s defenses.
Unseen Entanglement.onHit: 5[W] + Intelligence modifier + Constitution modifier damage. In addition, the target takes a -3 penalty to any defense to which your Swordmage Warding is currently granting a bonus (save ends).
Unseen Entanglement.onMiss: Half damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a -1 penalty to any defense to which your Swordmage Warding is currently granting a bonus.
